attributes.action: BAN FIREWORKS, SAVE ANIMALS! Only allow controlled firework displays!
attributes.additional_details: The effect fireworks are having on animals is horrendous! Dogs, Cats, Rabbits and so many wild animals have to suffers for days on end so that people can celebrate Guy Fawkes, Diwali, NYE etc. There are dogs that are having seizures due to the fear of fireworks. They don’t eat, try holding on their pee and poop which can cause a lot of damage to their systems. It’s about time we realise the effect fireworks are having on our environment and all the voiceless beings around us.
attributes.background: Ban fireworks for personal use in homes and only allow them to be used in a controlled public display

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700013
